WorkItem.Description:
If you want an icon to show for your website when it is saved as a favorit and in IE.
add the following line to Default.master:
 
<head  runat="server">
     <link type="text/css" rel="Stylesheet" href="clubsite.css" />
      <link REL="SHORTCUT ICON" HREF="~/Favicon.ico" />
</head>
 
And of course save your icon. In this example it lives in root.
 
Lex

Comments.Message: runat="server" isn't needed in this case. If we put in runat=server the title goes to the individual pages to handle and not the master page to deal with.
